attributes.action: Angel long to get an MBE for Services to the Porn Industry
attributes.additional_details: Angel Long has been in the Adult Industry for over 10 years she has provided men and women with countless hours of pleasure has won numerous awards and even has raised money for Cystic Fibrosis which she has. She has been able to raise awareness of the disease which is always a good thing and it doesn't hold her back from doing what she does best for this reason i think she has done a lot of good work and deserves an MBE for her contribution.
